0.2.name: wordpress/black-studio-wpml-javascript-redirect
0.2.description:
This plugin requires the WPML plugin to be installed and active. WPML comes with a native redirection feature based on browser language detection, but it doesn't work if you are using a caching plugin like W3 Total Cache or WP Super Cache, because the language detection and redirection is made at PHP level, and when serving cached pages that code is not executed at all. This plugin is a workaround for this limitation, as it implements language redirection through javascript, so it can work even in presence of caching plugins.
